original_text: He has delivered us from such a deadly peril, and he will deliver us again. On him we have set our hope that he will continue to deliver us,
korean_text: 그가 이같이 큰 사망에서 우리를 건지셨고 또 건지실 것이며 이후에도 건지시기를 그에게 바라노라

sentences.original_text: and he will deliver us again
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 다시 우리를 건지실 것이다

sentences.original_text: On him we have set our hope
that he will continue to deliver us
